title: Fundraiser Sites, Southern California Tea Fire, 11.2008
name: Fundraiser Sites, Southern California Tea Fire, 11.2008
description:
This dataset shows sites where fundraising for the Southern California TEA Fires are taking place today on the 18th of November, 2008. The information comes from a KABC News Report. Follow the link to the article.

Eyewitness News is reaching out to the community to help the victims of the latest wildfires.

To support the Sayre and the Triangle Complex wildfire victims, ABC7, KLOS, KABC Radio and the American Red Cross have organized a fundraiser.

The fundraiser will be held at two separate locations to help raise funds for the victims who now have to put their lives back together.

Donations to the Red Cross in cash and checks will be accepted throughout the day. Credit cards will also be accepted at both locations.

The drive-thru event will run from 5 a.m. to 6:30 p.m. on Tuesday, Nov. 18, at the following locations:

Rose Bowl Stadium
1001 Rose Bowl Drive
Pasadena, CA 91103

Honda Center (formerly Arrowhead Pond)
2695 E Katella Ave.
Anaheim, CA 92806


Members of the Eyewitness News team, KABC Radio and KLOS will be on hand at both locations.

If you are not able to stop by one of the locations and would like to donate, you can mail a check to:
ABC7
P.O. Box 5967
Glendale, CA 91221

Checks should be made payable to the Red Cross Disaster Relief Fund.
